node.title: Nearly a year into his presidency, Biden is again struggling to beat back a resurgent virus.
node.alt: President Biden boarding Marine One in Philadelphia on Friday.
node.content: ["WASHINGTON \u2014 The latest surge of the coronavirus is another reminder for President Biden of how hard it is to get ahead of the pandemic.", "Vaccine effectiveness has waned in the onslaught of Delta and Omicron. A spike in demand for testing is straining the system. And masks remain a political issue across the country.", "Nearly a year into his presidency, Mr. Biden\u2019s promise to \u201cshut down the virus, not the country\u201d remains only partly fulfilled. Stubborn resistance to vaccines among millions and the arrival of the fast-spreading new variant have upended the president\u2019s plans for a hopeful, end-of-the-year holiday season.", "Just a week before Christmas, Mr. Biden had to offer a warning of gloom.", "\u201cWe are looking at a winter of severe illness and death \u2014 if you\u2019re unvaccinated \u2014 for themselves, their families, and the hospitals they\u2019ll soon overwhelm,\u201d Mr. Biden said at the White House on Thursday. \u201cThe whole point is: Omicron is here, it\u2019s going to start to spread much more rapidly in the beginning of the year, and the only real protection is to get your shots.\u201d", "Issuing dire new warnings is not where Mr. Biden or his top advisers expected they would be at this point in the year.", "", ""]
